ID="converge__1"><SENSE-NUM>1</SENSE-NUM><SENSE-CONTENT><DEFINITION query="yes" resource="dict_british"> to come from different directions to reach the same point</DEFINITION><EXAMPLES ID="converge__2"><EXAMPLE>a station where three railway lines converge</EXAMPLE></EXAMPLES><EXAMPLES ID="converge__3"><EXAMPLE>Top diplomats were converging on Washington from all over the world.</EXAMPLE></EXAMPLES><TXREF txtitle="To move closer together in a group: " topic="converge__1" thesaurus="british"><Ref dictionary="british" entryId="assemble" bookmark="assemble__3">assemble</Ref>, <Ref dictionary="british" entryId="close-up_1" bookmark="close-up_1__4">close up</Ref>, <Ref dictionary="british" entryId="converge" bookmark="converge__1">converge</Ref>, <Ref dictionary="british" entryId="bunch_2" bookmark="bunch_2__1">bunch</Ref>, <Ref dictionary="british" entryId="cluster_2" bookmark="cluster_2__1">cluster</Ref>, <Ref dictionary="british" entryId="huddle_1" bookmark="huddle_1__1">huddle</Ref>, <Ref dictionary="british" entryId="clump-together" bookmark="clump-together__3">clump together</Ref>, <Ref dictionary="british" entryId="besiege" bookmark="besiege__2">besiege</Ref>, <Ref dictionary="british" entryId="crowd_2" bookmark="crowd_2__8">crowd</Ref>, <Ref dictionary="british" entryId="pile_2" bookmark="pile_2__10">pile</Ref></TXREF></SENSE-CONTENT></SENSE><SENSE ID="converge__4"><SENSE-NUM>2</SENSE-NUM><SENSE-CONTENT><DEFINITION query="yes" resource="dict_british"> to become the same or very similar</DEFINITION><EXAMPLES ID="converge__5"><EXAMPLE>Our opinions seldom converged.</EXAMPLE></EXAMPLES><TXREF txtitle="To be similar to, or the same as, something or someone: " topic="converge__4" thesaurus="british"><Ref dictionary="british" entryId="match_2" bookmark="match_2__1">match</Ref>, <Ref dictionary="british" entryId="correspond" bookmark="correspond__1">correspond</Ref>, <Ref dictionary="british" entryId="amount_2" bookmark="amount_2__2">amount to</Ref>, <Ref dictionary="british" entryId="coincide" bookmark="coincide__4">coincide</Ref>, <Ref dictionary="british" entryId="parallel_3" bookmark="parallel_3__1">parallel</Ref>, <Ref dictionary="british" entryId="approximate_2" bookmark="approximate_2__4">approximate</Ref>, <Ref dictionary="british" entryId="accord-with" bookmark="accord-with__1">accord with</Ref>, <Ref dictionary="british" entryId="invite-comparison-with" bookmark="invite-comparison-with__1">invite comparison with</Ref>, <Ref dictionary="british" entryId="have-something-in-common-with-something" bookmark="have-something-in-common-with-something__1">have something in common (with something)</Ref>, <Ref dictionary="british" entryId="bear-stand-comparison-with" bookmark="bear-stand-comparison-with__3"><SLASH>bear</SLASH><SLASH><SEP>/</SEP>stand</SLASH> comparison (with)</Ref></TXREF></SENSE-CONTENT></SENSE></HOMOGRAPH>
